Vite pug skeleton
Page 1Page 2Page 3Page 4

This is a mockup

This site is a static website build with vite using pug templates.

Pug integration is done by the plugin vite-plugin-pug-transform

Check the files in the git-hub project to start yours. Take a look at index.html file to see how to include your pug templates

You can write your style files using scss or sass.

This is a local variable

Take a look at vite.config.js file to see how to pass variables to your pug templates.

vite-pug-skeleton proudly serve to you by Víctor Auñón
